summary: Monsieur Cinema, a hundred years old, lives alone in a large villa. His memories fade away, so he engages a young woman to tell him stories about all the movies ever made.
cast: Michel Piccoli|Marcello Mastroianni|Henri Garcin|Julie Gayet|Mathieu Demy|Emmanuel Salinger|Anouk Aimée|Fanny Ardant|Jean-Paul Belmondo|Romane Bohringer|Sandrine Bonnaire|Jean-Claude Brialy|Patrick Bruel|Alain Delon|Catherine Deneuve|Robert De Niro|Gérard Depardieu|Harrison Ford|Gina Lollobrigida|Jeanne Moreau|Hanna Schygulla|Sabine Azéma|Jane Birkin|Stephen Dorff|Andréa Ferréol|Assumpta Serna|Daniel Toscan du Plantier|Isabelle Adjani|Jean-Hugues Anglade|Daniel Auteuil|Clint Eastwood|Virna Lisi|Maximilien Maussion|Salomé Blechmans|Carole Benoit|Weiwei Melk|Christian Bouillette|Frédéric Darié|Alexia Stresi|Denis Sebbah|Antoine Desrosières|Marie Piémontèse|Jean-Claude Romer|Daniel Dublet|Benjamin Salinger|Eléonore Pourriat|Marina Castelnuovo|Francisco Rabal|René Basly|Bernard Bastide|Sandra Bernhard|Gary Chekchak|Arielle Dombasle|Emmanuelle Gaborit|François Guillot|Marcel Guéguan|Daryl Hannah|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Stéphane Krausz|Bertrand Lalande|Emily Lloyd|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Jean-Pierre Moerman|Henri Morelle|Filippo Paese|Nicolas Pissaboeuf|Didier Rouget|Martin Sheen|Harry Dean Stanton|Léonard Vindry|Eric Zaouali
title: Las cien y una noches
